title: Blood Dynasty
subtitle: Shadows of the Eternal Night
description: Rule from the shadows as the ancient vampire houses vie for supremacy. Navigate centuries of intrigue, cultivate your bloodline's power, and either unite the clans under your banner or watch them destroy each other in endless warfare.
shortDescription: Unite the vampire clans and establish eternal dominion from the shadows.

story.synopsis: The vampire progenitor has been destroyed, and without his unifying will, the great houses descend into civil war. As heir to House Corvinus, you must either unite the clans or emerge as the sole survivor of the Long Night.
story.prologue: For millennia, the First Vampire ruled all kindred from the shadows, his will absolute. But someone has committed the unthinkable - the progenitor is dead, his essence scattered to the winds. Now the great houses turn upon each other, each seeking to claim his throne. The Long Night has begun, and only the strongest bloodline will see its end.
story.epilogue: The blood wars are over. House Corvinus stands supreme, its enemies destroyed or subjugated. But ruling the kindred proves more challenging than conquering them. As the new Blood King, you must forge order from chaos - and protect your kind from the mortal hunters who grow ever bolder.
story.setting: The shadow kingdoms of the vampire nobility
